critAlertDetails.query:
//aks failed pod alert for clusters
 let endDateTime = now();
 let startDateTime = ago(30m);
 let trendBinSize = 1m;
 KubePodInventory
 | where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
 | where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
 | distinct ClusterName, TimeGenerated, Name
 | summarize ClusterSnapshotCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize), ClusterName, Name
 | join hint.strategy=broadcast (KubePodInventory
 | where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
 | where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
 | distinct ClusterName, Computer, PodUid, TimeGenerated, PodStatus, Name
 | summarize TotalCount = count(), PendingCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ 'Pending'), RunningCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ 'Running'), SucceededCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ 'Succeeded'), FailedCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ 'Failed'), CrashCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ 'CrashLoopBackOff'), TerminateCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ 'Terminating'), EvictedCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ 'Evicted')
 by ClusterName, Name, bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize)
 ) on ClusterName, Name, TimeGenerated
 | extend UnknownCount = TotalCount - PendingCount - RunningCount - SucceededCount - FailedCount
 | project ClusterName, Name, TimeGenerated, TotalCount = todouble(TotalCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount, PendingCount = todouble(PendingCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount, RunningCount = todouble(RunningCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount, SucceededCount = todouble(SucceededCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount, FailedCount = todouble(FailedCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount, UnknownCount = todouble(UnknownCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount, CrashCount = todouble(CrashCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount, TerminateCount = todouble(TerminateCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount, EvictedCount = todouble(EvictedCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount
 | summarize ["Minutes in Failed"] = sum(FailedCount) by Computer=ClusterName, Pod=Name
 | where ["Minutes in Failed"] between (20 .. 30)
